alert.note: Alert for Inland Dixie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 30 at 1:21PM EDT until further notice by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Big Bend Florida, including the following areas, Inland Dixie, Inland Jefferson, Inland Taylor, Lafayette and Madison. Portions of south central Georgia, including the following areas, Ben Hill, Berrien, Brooks, Colquitt, Cook, Irwin, Lanier, Lowndes, Thomas, Tift, Turner and Worth. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rain from Hurricane Idalia has left these areas prone to flooding with only a little more rain. Therefore, the Flood Watch will continue. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
